name: Cockwork Industries Complete
description:
Cockwork Industries Complete is an erotic adventure game where you play as Dwayne, winner of the Willy Wanker's Golden Ticket, invited to attend the mysterious event that's about to take place in the infamous science facility - Cockwork Industries.

Learn the mysteries of Cockwork Industries and romance its steaming-hot employees in this thrilling tale of sex, science, deception and panda plushies!
